titles.title: To amend the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 relating to the dumping of dredged material in the Historic Area Remediation Site, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/27/2000--Introduced. Amends the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 to prohibit dredged material from any Federal or non-Federal project from being dumped in the dredged materials disposal area located east of Sandy Hook, New Jersey, and known as the Historic Area Remediation Site. Makes a provision of such Act regarding State programs and rights with respect to ocean dumping inapplicable to this Act.
